comment._content: I have an ongoing project (brand new, of course), started in an effort to help restore the color to these images, but also try to maintain the integrity and charm of the original. Here is the adjusted photo: www.flickr.com/photos/alec_fredericks/2201449102/

comment._content: More than likely it is a family farm, or sharecropping.  This is what my family left in south Ga., when GreatGrands with family in tow caught the train to Pittsburgh as part of the 2nd Great Wave North.
